message.content:
1. A trial was conducted to evaluate the effect of paroxetine.
2. Paroxetine is an antidepressant.
3. The trial focused on mildly depressed women.
4. The women in the trial have type 2 diabetes.
5. The trial aimed to evaluate the effect of paroxetine on metabolic control.
6. The trial aimed to evaluate the effect of paroxetine on quality of life.
7. The trial aimed to evaluate the effect of paroxetine on mental well-being.

messages.content:
Statement: The aim of this trial was to evaluate the effect of the antidepressant paroxetine on metabolic control, quality of life and mental well-being in mildly depressed women with type 2 diabetes.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
